value:
My brother prefers not to burden me.
I suppose that could mean that he
thinks I'm not up to the task.

I'm going to become friends with
every Hero—ever! Oh, what a
grand party it will be!

Oh, are you possibly on patrol,
$Nu?$k$pWell, of course you are. You're
the best. Really, the BEST.

Oh, do you have time to chat,
$Nu?$k$pI'm a great listener. Bet you didn't
know that!

I often write letters to my mother.
We live in the same castle, but we
rarely have a chance to speak!

How do you do? Huh? So this is
another Askran Kingdom... Hey, tell me!
How's the ME here? Nice, right?

How wonderful. It's my time
to shine!

I'm delighted to rise to the
occasion!

Eeep! Sorry. I know that I can
do much better.

More power? For me? I may well
faint away!

You know, I consider it a high honor
and an exceptional privilege to
spend these moments with you.$k$pAw, who am I kidding,
$Nu?$k$pHa! Let's drop all that royal
jibber-jabber. It's just us,
right? Right!$k$pThe thing is, I love being around
you. I've never been happier!$k$pSure, you're a valuable addition
to the Order of Heroes—blah,
blah, blabbity, blah.$k$pBut after spending so much time
with you, I just think of you
more like...a close friend.$k$pDo you feel the same? Are we
friends? Best friends? On our
way to being best friends?$k$pWe are? Er, which one?
Never mind. I'm just delighted...
so delighted...so very...$k$pWaah! You've made me cry,
you silly goose.$k$pI won't forget this day. Why, I'll
save all my tears of happiness in
a vial to remind me—forever!
Ha! What was that? A sneak attack?
If there's one thing I'm really good at, it's lighting up the room!
I know my brother can be a bit serious. But I think he's quite fond of you.
The Order of Heroes is simply spectacular since you showed up!
I wish I could summon Heroes like you. Then we'd really have a party!
You know, I pledge forever and ever to be your number-one fan!
Shadow Dragon and the Blade of Light
